bios.text:
💔 Broken but still breathing
🌧 Storms don't last forever
☔ But right now it's raining
😔 Healing takes time

😶 Words left unsaid
💭 Thoughts keep spinning
🌑 Dark nights
🌅 Hoping for sunrise

🖤 Black heart
🎶 Sad songs on repeat
📖 Missing chapter
🚶‍♂ Walking alone

💧 Tears dry
🕳 Empty inside
🛌 Can't sleep
🌌 Nightmares awake

🚶‍♀ Walking through pain
🩹 Scars tell stories
💔 Heart in pieces
⏳ Time will tell

🌫 Lost in thoughts
🎭 Fake smile
💌 Letters unsent
😢 Crying inside
